The '''East-Central Africa Division of Seventh-day Adventists''' is a sub-entity of the [[General Conference of Seventh-day Adventists]]. It covers the area of the nations of [[Eritrea]], [[Somalia]], [[Ethiopia]], [[Kenya]], [[Tanzania]], [[Uganda]], [[Rwanda]], [[Burundi]], and the [[Democratic Republic of the Congo]]. It is headquartered in [[Nairobi, Kenya|Nairobi]], [[Kenya]].
It is sub-divided into seven missions, one mission field, one association, and an attached territory.
